titles.title: To amend the definition of "production facility" in the Atomic Energy Act of 1954 to exclude an equipment or device capable of reprocessing spent nuclear fuel in a manner that does not separate plutonium from other transuranic elements, and for other purposes.
Nuclear REFUEL (Recycling Efficient Fuels Utilizing Expedited Licensing) Act
Nuclear REFUEL (Recycling Efficient Fuels Utilizing Expedited Licensing) Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
